DESCRIPTION: 计算当前仪式的怪物。最多有5种仪式。
某些卡片允许您再次进行仪式。再次进行仪式时，将重放该卡，并忽略Tribute成本。例：死者蘇生
删除给定数量的仪式。除非你有足够的仪式贡,你不能玩致敬卡.
增加你的最大仪式数量。
宝珠：在回合开始时增加你的动力堆。唤起会给一个随机的buff。
宝珠：回合结束时的仪式。唤醒增加你的最大召唤。
宝珠：在你的回合开始时，随机添加Dragon牌。唤起效果会将手中随机龙的成本设置为0。
当转弯结束时手中有一张带溢出的牌时，请激活一个效果。这种效果的用途有限。
香椿只有在卡通世界处于活动状态时才能播放。如果你使用另一个卡通向一个卡通怪物致敬，对所有敌人造成5点伤害。
与磁铁战士怪物相关的代币。磁铁没有固有的影响。
手中添加2张随机牌，本回合费用为0。应用1个随机buff。对敌人施加2个随机减益效果。
当你为另一条龙致敬龙时，获得1点力量。
When you #yTribute a #ySpellcaster monster for a #yDragon, lose #b2 #yHP.
When you #yTribute an #yInsect monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When you #yTribute a #yPlant monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
#yPredaplant monsters are treated as #yPlants. When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, adds random #ySpell cards to your hand. #yEvoke also adds #ySpells to your hand.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yChannel a random #yOrb. #yEvoke increases your #yOrb slots by #b1.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, if your #yDexterity is higher than your #yStrength, increases your #yStrength by #b1 for each stack of #yDexterity you have. #yEvoke adds random monsters to your hand and sets their cost to #b0 for that turn.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, triggers a random positive action. #yEvoke also triggers random actions.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #ySummons a [#FF5252]Shadow [#FF5252]Token. #yEvoke: #yResummon monsters from your discard pile on random enemies.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add random, 0-cost, Ethereal Duelist cards to your hand. #yEvoke: Has a chance to draw #b5 cards.
#yOrb: Deal damage to ALL enemies, gain #yEnergy and #yBlock. NL #yGate is unaffected by #yFocus.
